name: compilergo
description: Tên đề tài: "Xây dựng trang web viết code online cho Java, C#, Python, C++" ---------------------------- Project use ReactJS + NodeJS + MongoDB + Redux Project Name : CompilerGo Thành Viên:  +Nguyễn Đình Hiếu 20142498 +Vũ Thanh Sang 20110555 +Nguyễn Văn Tú 20110591 ---------------------------- API  User Sign Up: Post http://localhost:3240/v1/users/signUp (truyền vào email, password (firstName,lastName không bắt buộc )) Sign In: Post http://localhost:3240/v1/users/signIn (truyền vào email , password) Google authentication: Get http://localhost:3240/v1/users/auth/google/ Github authentication: Get http://localhost:3240/v1/users/auth/github/ Data trả về khi authentication(google,github) : get http://localhost:3240/v1/users/signIn/success

scripts.install: npm run install-server && npm run install-client
scripts.watch: npm run server & npm run client
scripts.deploy: npm run build --prefix client && npm run dev --prefix server
scripts.test: npm run test --prefix server && npm run test --prefix client
